data.title: Kirk Cameron, 'Growing Pains' Star, Shares Love Story With 'Entertainment Tonight' (VIDEO)
data.meta_description: 'Growing Pains' Star Shares Adorable Love Story
data.text: "It's a great story, I can't believe it's true. I came home and my mom said to me, 'Hey, when you were on the set today, do you remember that girl you met Chelsea Noble?' And I said, 'How could I forget -- she was beautiful and sweet and amazing.' And she said, 'Well she's even more beautiful on the inside than she is on the outside. She's been here for a few days and I just want you to know that if you ever meet a girl and you get married, I hope she's someone just like her.' And four years later, I married her."
